column1: 253917,Diagnostic and Interventional Radiologist,,"Analyse test results to inform diagnosis or treatment
column3: Prepare reports summarising patient diagnostic or care activities
column7: Collaborate with health care professionals to plan or provide treatment
column11: Inform medical professionals regarding patient conditions and care
column13: Develop health care quality and safety procedures
column15: Analyse patient data to determine patient needs or treatment goals
column17: Work with radiation or radioactive materials
column21: Collect medical information from patients, family members or other medical professionals
column23: Gather medical information from patient histories
column27: Explain medical procedures or test results to patients or family members
column29: Communicate test or assessment results to medical professionals
column31: Communicate detailed medical information to patients or family members
column33: Administer medical substances for imaging or other procedures
column37: Verify that medical activities or operations meet standards
column43: Administer anaesthetics or sedatives to control pain
column47: Examine patients to assess general physical condition
column51: Conduct research to increase knowledge about medical issues
column55: Monitor patients following surgeries or other treatments
column57: Advise others on health care issues
